headline: Auto stocks pull higher as Trump reverses on reciprocal duties, but auto tariffs remain
summary: Auto stocks pulled higher after President Trump backed off and announced a 90-day pause on tariffs for most countries, yet at the same time he increased levies on China, and kept auto tariffs in place.

raw.headline: Auto stocks pull higher as Trump reverses on reciprocal duties, but auto tariffs remain
raw.summary: Auto stocks pulled higher after President Trump backed off and announced a 90-day pause on tariffs for most countries, yet at the same time he increased levies on China, and kept auto tariffs in place.

headline: GM to end production of Cadillac XT6 SUV at Tennessee facility in US – report
summary: GM plans to extend the smaller XT5 crossover's production at the facility until at least the end of 2026.

raw.headline: GM to end production of Cadillac XT6 SUV at Tennessee facility in US – report
raw.summary: GM plans to extend the smaller XT5 crossover's production at the facility until at least the end of 2026.

headline: Top 4 Value Stocks to Buy Now Amid Tariff-Driven Market Volatility
summary: Value investing is essentially about selecting stocks that are cheap but fundamentally sound. STNE, ASB, ENS & GM boast a low P/CF ratio.

headline: 5 Low Price-to-Book Stocks to Add to Your Portfolio in April

headline: EnergyHub partners with GM to use EVs as grid resources
summary: General Motors’ sales of electric vehicles jumped 94% in the first quarter. EnergyHub said its managed EV charging programs can help utilities maintain grid stability as EV demand rises.

raw.headline: EnergyHub partners with GM to use EVs as grid resources
